Description_lang: Empowered by the light, increasing all damage done by $s1% and inflicting $429103s1 Holy damage every $t3 sec to all players within $429103a1 yards.The overwhelming power of the light stuns targets upon removal.
AuraDescription_lang: Damage done increased by $s1%.Inflicting $429103s1 Holy damage to players within $429103a1 yards every $t3 sec.The overwhelming power of the light stuns targets upon removal.
